segments.text: I am not sure how to add a class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have an add sheet for me to sign ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you get the signed add slip , you must take it to the Admissions and Records Office or you will not be added . Can you find the office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I know where it is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Across the courtyard on the right is the office . Follow the signs to the correct line . Is that clear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your directions . It's clear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can't miss it . Add the class and then come back . We'll check later to make sure you are on the roll sheet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do the same thing with a drop slip if you ever need to drop a class . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
